department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Amendment to closing time: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 15, 2024 at 14:00 EDT.
full_summary:
# Vehicle Barrier Maintenance Services for Parliament Hill

## Notice Type and Solicitation Number

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4597211255
* **Publication Date**: June 4, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 15, 2024, 14:00 EDT

## Contract Requirements

* The selected contractor must furnish all necessary tools, equipment, materials, travel, and labor to maintain, inspect, test, provide software updates and/or upgrades, repair, and service the vehicle security barriers on Parliament Hill, Ottawa, in accordance with the attached Statement of Work.
* The period of any resulting contract will be for a period of five (5) years.
* The contractor must comply with the security requirements associated with this requirement.
* A mandatory site visit will be held on June 25, 2024, at 10:00am EDT. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than June 13, 2024, at 14:00 EDT to confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

## Tender Status and Cancellation

* The tender is cancelled.

## Categories and Classification

* **UNSPSC**: 72100000 - Building and facility maintenance and repair services
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Trade Agreements**: WTO GPA, Canada-Peru FTA, Canada-Honduras FTA, Canadian FTA, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Ukraine FTA, Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, NAFTA, Canada-Colombia FTA, Canada-Panama FTA, Canada-Chile FTA, CPTPP, Canada-Korea FTA

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Wang, Jessica (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [jessica.wang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.wang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None

## Publication and Access to Information

* The tender notice and all related documentation are available on Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19910017](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19910017).

Note: I've removed unnecessary information and rephrased the content for clarity and concision. I
